sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.AJAXEmailAddressValidator</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>AJAXEmailAddressValidator</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AJAXEmailAddressValidator = Class.create();
AJAXEmailAddressValidator.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	
	// Validate the email addresses returning back a string containing all the invalid addresses
	// as well as the reason why each is invalid
	validate : function() {
		var addresses = this.getParameter('sysparm_addresses');

		return SNC.EmailAddressValidator.validate(addresses).join(', ');
	},
	
	// Validate the email addresses returning back a string containing all the invalid addresses
	filterOutValid : function() {
		var addresses = this.getParameter('sysparm_addresses');

		return SNC.EmailAddressValidator.filterOutValid(addresses).join(', ');
	},
	
    type: 'AJAXEmailAddressValidator'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2016-01-11 18:56:38</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>310907837f3012005f58108c3ffa91da</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>AJAXEmailAddressValidator</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Subscription Based Notifications" source="com.glide.notification">52dc70c36d2220100acb70b353433038</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_310907837f3012005f58108c3ffa91da</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2016-01-11 22:51:13</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>736</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
